description:
While spending some time with Mihono and the rest of the Akabanetou Investigation Squad, the humanoid aradama named Kohime begins to open up to humans. But after finding out that Tojis are supposed to cut down and exorcise aradamas, she closes off her heart once more. The fact that Tojis and aradamas are destined to fight troubles Kohime, and Mihono and the others worry about her. One day, after the squad receives orders to subjugate some aradamas, Kohime escapes from the Origami Family`s facility and tries to find Mihono and the others and...
Source: crunchyroll
